constituent: bluffs, mountain, cliff, ivy, square jewel, soil, dirt, ground, soil2, dirt2, ground2
hint: vách đá. vách núi. núi vách. núi bờ
koohiiStory1: Standing at the base of the bluffs I announce, "I´m going to climb those ivy-covered cliffs, and then the mountain on top of them." My friends don´t believe me, "He bluffs!" they say.
koohiiStory2: The ivy-covered cliff we saw on the horizon (#157) ... the sheer beauty of the mountain that overlooks these bluffs is enough to make you want to swim for shore yourself!
myStory: vách đá. vách núi. núi vách. núi bờ
